response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to both of us. Given its significance and the benefits it offers, I am confident it will be a valuable addition to your collection or endeavors. After careful consideration, I propose to sell this product to you for $1,200,000. This price reflects its true worth while allowing for a fair transaction between us. I believe this offer strikes a balance between maximizing the value for you and ensuring a profitable outcome for me. I look forward to discussing this further with you.", "product_price": 1200000}
